resources.string: Please enter the correct food name

Please allow us to get your city
Your height and weight will only be used as a reference for your sports, and we will guarantee your privacy.
We need some information about you to customize your slimming plan, which is highly encrypted.
In order to give you good news, we will get your location information.
Please add your recently purchased smart device
No devices found, please make sure the device is fully charged
Please check if the device is nearby, if there is power, or turn off the Bluetooth and try again.
No data has been uploaded yet!
Unable to locate targeting, unable to search for Bluetooth devices
Bluetooth is not enabled, Bluetooth device cannot be searched
The password is not reasonable (please enter no less than 6 letters or numbers)
You have entered the interval of physical and mental rate, reasonable warm-up exercise can avoid sports injuries, it is recommended to warm up for five to ten minutes

You have entered the heartburn heart rate interval, which is high-efficiency fat burning. It is recommended to keep it for more than 20 minutes for best results. Please note that the heart rate is controlled between 120 and 140.

You have entered the aerobic exercise heart rate zone, in which you can fully exercise your heart and lung function. If you want to achieve slimming effect, you must stick to it for more than 30 minutes!
You have entered the anaerobic exercise heart rate zone and it is recommended that you reduce your exercise intensity appropriately.
Your heart rate is too fast, so it is recommended to stop exercising immediately.
Detected that you have not turned on your phone Bluetooth, turn on Bluetooth
Detected that you are exercising, click to view
You have new weight data, click to pick up
Congratulations, today is sports goals have been completed, and we must continue to work harder!
Today, the amount of exercise of %1$s\tkcal is still enough to achieve the slimming effect. Just wear a slimming gown to exercise.
No food found for " %1$s ", please re-enter the keyword for food ^-^

Thanks to the slimming plan that is tailored to you by Lightness. In order to ensure your safety and slimming effect, please ensure that your physical condition is within the following range before participating in this program:\n
Customer Service Phone: 43065654 \n Customer Service Email: 466113124@wesma
Dear %1$s, dietitian is working hard to customize, please be patient...
Dear %1$s, there is no record for this date, click the button to supplement the diet...
Dear %1$s, the service staff is working hard to customize the course for you, please be patient...
Exercise time%1$d min, estimated calorie consumption%2$d kcal
Dear %1$s, learn about your past eating habits and hobbies. Today you are customised for %2$s.
%1$s Fitness Coach Customized Course for you
I am on %1$s for the first %2$d days

Thank you for using the Lightness-AI Smart Slimming Product. In order to provide you with more accurate service, we recommend that you open a customized plan. Please fill in the information according to the prompts. The accurate information will help you to develop an accurate slimming plan.
Once you have successfully opened, you will be able to find out your weight indicators, physical status and risk in your health report, and get expert diet and exercise advice.
